 2023-03612023-04-21LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to (1) require employers to reimburse their employees for work-related expenses within 30 days of an employee submitting a claim for payment, where there is no written agreement setting out an alternative time limit; (2) prescribe the factors to consider in determining if an expense is or is not work-related; (3) prescribe the factors to consider in determining if an expense is or is not reasonable; (4) prescribe what information should be provided in the written employment statement; and (5) designate new provisions under the Code relating to employer and employee rights and obligations for the purposes of administrative monetary penalties.
